name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】KIARA & FRIENDS： H!P Cover Song Spring Concert #HPmeetsHoloEN [jjLLByDa3Xc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara performs her new original song "Perfume" with back dancers.
MC section: Kiara reflects on the formation for "Rival" by Berryz Kobo, introduces her new song "Perfume" and its single jacket, and sets up the final song.
Takanashi Kiara performs "BYE BYE BYE", a cover of a song by ℃-ute.

subtitles.original: Wee!
subtitles.english: Wee!

subtitles.original: Yippee! That was my new song!
subtitles.english: Yippee! That was my new song!

subtitles.original: But before that, before we go into that, I shall explain.
subtitles.english: But before that, before we go into that, I shall explain.

subtitles.original: Before the new song, we had...
subtitles.english: Before the new song, we had...

subtitles.original: ...one of my favorite songs from my favorite idol group Berryz Kobo...
subtitles.english: ...one of my favorite songs from my favorite idol group Berryz Kobo...

subtitles.original: ...'RIVAL', which you know...
subtitles.english: ...'RIVAL', which you know...

subtitles.original: ...that had a really awesome formation, right? It was so fun with like...
subtitles.english: ...that had a really awesome formation, right? It was so fun with like...

subtitles.original: ...turning around in like different timings and everything.
subtitles.english: ...turning around in like different timings and everything.

subtitles.original: Really difficult, but really fun, and I think it will look beautiful to you guys. I hope so!
subtitles.english: Really difficult, but really fun, and I think it will look beautiful to you guys. I hope so!

subtitles.original: Well, besides that...
subtitles.english: Well, besides that...

subtitles.original: another song with many members, or members, many people in one place...
subtitles.english: another song with many members, or members, many people in one place...

subtitles.original: ...was my new song, PERFUME!
subtitles.english: ...was my new song, PERFUME!

subtitles.original: Yay, yay, yay, yay!
subtitles.english: Yay, yay, yay, yay!

subtitles.original: It will be released today!
subtitles.english: It will be released today!

subtitles.original: And the jacket is here! Ta-da!
subtitles.english: And the jacket is here! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: Wah wah wah!
subtitles.english: Wah wah wah!

subtitles.original: Kind of like... it is... I wanted it to be like this...
subtitles.english: Kind of like... it is... I wanted it to be like this...

subtitles.original: ...so it doesn't give away any hint of anime or so. It's just a perfume.
subtitles.english: ...so it doesn't give away any hint of anime or so. It's just a perfume.

subtitles.original: I wonder what smell it is.
subtitles.english: I wonder what smell it is.

subtitles.original: Hmm, here.
subtitles.english: Hmm, here.

subtitles.original: Here, smell my armpits.
subtitles.english: Here, smell my armpits.

subtitles.original: Then you will find out. Ah, stinky! Ah!
subtitles.english: Then you will find out. Ah, stinky! Ah!

subtitles.original: Okay, well, that's Perfume.
subtitles.english: Okay, well, that's Perfume.

subtitles.original: Yeah, and the music video will also come out after this.
subtitles.english: Yeah, and the music video will also come out after this.

subtitles.original: The premiere, you may have already seen that it's up.
subtitles.english: The premiere, you may have already seen that it's up.

subtitles.original: It's about to begin anytime soon, so be ready for it. It's gonna be really beautiful again...
subtitles.english: It's about to begin anytime soon, so be ready for it. It's gonna be really beautiful again...

subtitles.original: ...with different new 3D outfits, maybe perhaps one that I designed as well.
subtitles.english: ...with different new 3D outfits, maybe perhaps one that I designed as well.

subtitles.original: And maybe one that Ora-da designed. Yeah!
subtitles.english: And maybe one that Ora-da designed. Yeah!

subtitles.original: That's right, giving away all the secrets already now.
subtitles.english: That's right, giving away all the secrets already now.

subtitles.original: Okay, well...
subtitles.english: Okay, well...

subtitles.original: ...yeah, I hope you really enjoyed it. It was really tough, Perfume practice.
subtitles.english: ...yeah, I hope you really enjoyed it. It was really tough, Perfume practice.

subtitles.original: I practiced so much on it, and if you maybe noticed, I had even more back dancers than last time.
subtitles.english: I practiced so much on it, and if you maybe noticed, I had even more back dancers than last time.

subtitles.original: Last time was four...
subtitles.english: Last time was four...

subtitles.original: ...and I was the fifth one, was I? And now it's six...
subtitles.english: ...and I was the fifth one, was I? And now it's six...

subtitles.original: ...and I'm the seventh one.
subtitles.english: ...and I'm the seventh one.

subtitles.original: So I wanted things to look even more complicated and more interesting.
subtitles.english: So I wanted things to look even more complicated and more interesting.

subtitles.original: I hope I managed to do that, and I hope you liked it.
subtitles.english: I hope I managed to do that, and I hope you liked it.

subtitles.original: And that was the only song today that is not Hello! Project.
subtitles.english: And that was the only song today that is not Hello! Project.

subtitles.original: And even though probably usually makes more sense for me to end it on my new original song...
subtitles.english: And even though probably usually makes more sense for me to end it on my new original song...

subtitles.original: ...since this is all Hello! Project themed...
subtitles.english: ...since this is all Hello! Project themed...

subtitles.original: ...we will still end it with one more song...
subtitles.english: ...we will still end it with one more song...

subtitles.original: ...with a Hello! Project song, one of my favorite ones from ℃-ute.
subtitles.english: ...with a Hello! Project song, one of my favorite ones from ℃-ute.

subtitles.original: And it's called 'Bye Bye Bye'.
subtitles.english: And it's called 'Bye Bye Bye'.

subtitles.original: So to you I also say: Bye Bye Bye! Thank you for watching!
subtitles.english: So to you I also say: Bye Bye Bye! Thank you for watching!

subtitles.original: Enjoy the last song!
subtitles.english: Enjoy the last song!
